description:
★BESHI the frog, a famous character by Fujio Akatsuka,
 the king of Japanese gag manga of the Showa era, has been made into a game.

★What is the frog's BESHI?
A character that appears in Moretsu Ataro (Shonen Sunday, published by Shogakukan), which began serialization in 1967.
Moretsu Ataro was so popular that it became a social phenomenon at the time, and has been made into an anime twice in the past.

◎How to play
This is the so-called Japanese goldfish scooping.
This is played by the character BESHI.
Manipulate the POI to scoop up the BESHI and put it into the bowl.
There are three pots to scoop up the BESHI. The time limit is 3 minutes.
How many BESHI can you scoop up within 3 minutes?

There are also techniques that can help you aim for high scores, such as KASUMI-SUKUI, TSUBAME-GAESHI, and BUNSHIN-no-JYUTSU.
Get a high score and aim for the top of the ranking.
Mysterious characters such as NYAROME and KEMNPAS will also appear.

Each stage has 5 stages where you can feel the four seasons of Japan.
You can enjoy Japanese traditional features while feeling the Japanese taste.
